title: FLIGHT ADVISORY - GPS Interference Testing – Southern California Tactical Training Range, CA
description: FLIGHT ADVISORY GPS INTERFERENCE TESTING SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA TACTICAL TRAINING RANGE (SCTTR) 25-02 (REVISION 2) 29 April Southern California Tactical Training Range, CA Centered at 325744N1183321W the SXC180026 The entire flight advisory may be accessed and downloaded at the following address: https://www.faasafety.gov/files/notices/2025/Apr/SCTTR__25-02_GPS_Flight_Advisory_(Revision_2).pdf Pilots are advised to check NOTAMs frequently for possible changes prior to operations in the area. NOTAMs will be published at least 24 hours in advance of any GPS tests.
